amendatorysection.para: The mayor and council members shall maintain offices at the city hall; and the mayor shall, in a general way, constantly investigate all public affairs concerning the interest of the city and investigate and ascertain, in a general way, the efficiency and manner in which all departments of the city government are being conducted; and the mayor shall recommend to the city council all such matters as in his or her judgment should receive the investigation, consideration, or action of that body.
